titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd in St. Paul's Cathedral at the annual meeting of the Sons of the Clergy, Tuesday, December vii, 1697 by George Stanhope ... : to which is annexed a faithful account of the charities distributed by that corporation for fourteen years last past.
titleStmt.author: Stanhope, George, 1660-1728.
